AKSOUNDENGINE_API
#define AK_CALLBACK ( __TYPE__,
__NAME__   )     typedef __TYPE__ ( AKSOUNDENGINE_CALL *__NAME__ )

Declare a callback function type

Parameters:
__TYPE__ Return type of the function
__NAME__ Name of the function
Remarks:
This must be followed by the parentheses containing the function arguments declaration
